description: A family of triangles T(m), m >= 0, read by triangles and then by rows; let P(m) be the triangle made up of the first m+1 rows of Pascal's triangle (A007318), R(m) (respectively L(m)) be P(m) rotated to the right (respectively to the left), T(m)(n, k) = gcd(P(m)(n, k), R(m)(n, k), L(m)(n, k)).
